Linux notification system.


To use LibNotify you have to install libnotify and  [http://java-gnome.sourceforge.net/ java-gnome]

on a Derbian system just
<code>
sudo apt-get install libjava-gnome-java libnotify
</code>

=Knwon Issues=
 In some Java distributions jWeatherWatch crashes with 
<code>
GThread-ERROR **: GThread system may only be initialized once.
aborting...
</code>
when changing notifier from TrayIcon to libnotify.
Then you have to edit ~/.jWeatherWatch/settings.xml and change  <code><notifer>TryIcon</notifer></code>
to
<code><notifer>LibNotify</notifer></code>
and restart
